OWNER_ID.description: Owner's ID get it from your Json of any message forwarded to Json

WEBHOOK.description: ANYTHING = allowing webhooks when in env mode

URL.description: APP LINK (APP NAME AS A SUBDOMAIN OF HEROKU) https://appname.herokuapp.com/

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: optional: A MESSAGE CENTRE WHERE ARE THE GARBAGE MSGS WILL BE STORED

SUDO_USERS.description: id's of SUDO USERS separated by space ie people with powers of all less than the owner

SUPPORT_USERS.description: id's of SUPPORT USERS separated by space ie people can gban/ungban, nothing elsE

WHITELIST_USERS.description: id's of WHITE LISTED separated by space ie people - they can't be banned.

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks

DEL_CMDS.description: IF YOU WANT TO DELETE THE COMMANDS USED BY USERS NOT SUPPOSED TO.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Person that was gban earlier and joins a new group in which your bot is too will be banned right after he sends anything.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: This will allow ! to be used as well as /.

BAN_STICKER.description: STICKERS USED AFTER BANNING ANYONE. Use https://telegram.dog/ShowJsonBot to get the file_id
